name: slapp-cloud-functions
description: Google Cloud Functions for Slapp evaluation processing with Gemini and MongoDB

scripts.deploy:process: gcloud functions deploy processEvaluation --gen2 --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region asia-south1 --memory 1GB --timeout 540s --env-vars-file=.env.yaml --project=slapp-478005
scripts.deploy:save: gcloud functions deploy saveEvaluationResults --gen2 --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region asia-south1 --memory 512MB --timeout 300s --env-vars-file=.env.yaml --project=slapp-478005 --entry-point=saveEvaluationResults --source=.
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:process && npm run deploy:save
